name: Slime Slayer (itch) (Sleepy Vampire Games)
description:
Kill as many slimes as possible. Every 100 slimes killed will earn you an extra life. How many can you slay before being overwhelmed? 

Controls

Move: Arrow Keys

Attack: "Z"

Dash: "X"

Pause: Enter

Pause the game to see how many slimes you've killed and how many lives you have left.
